summary: A film crew ventures into the forest in search of the mythical 'Jersey Devil'.
cast: David Beard|Jim Seward|Stefan Avalos|Lance Weiler|Rein Clabbers|Michele Pulaski|Tom Brunt|Mark Rublee|A.D. Roso|Dale Worstall|Vann K. Weller|Sam Wells|Jay MacDonald|Faith Weiler|Marianne Connor|Robert Weiler|Jennifer Nasal|Brett Nielsen|Holly Madison|Jeremy Coleman|Todd Weiler|Chadd Ritenbaugh
title: The Last Broadcast
